abstract: A two-hour installment of Fox’s reality series “So You Think You Can Dance” led the network to victory in the ratings on Wednesday as 8.8 million viewers tuned in to the show from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A two-hour installment of Fox’s reality series “So You Think You Can Dance” led the network to victory in the ratings on Wednesday as 8.8 million viewers tuned in to the show from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: So You Think You Can Beat Fox in the Ratings?
